All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Adventure
Class that represents an Adventure.
AdventureDAO
Interface that provides methods for retrieving and persisting adventure data.
AdventureFacade
Interface that provides methods for managing adventures.
AdventureManager
This class manages adventures and provides methods for retrieving and persisting adventure data.
AdventureNameAlreadyExistsException
This exception is thrown when an adventure with the same name already exists in the system.
Adventurer
Class that represents an Adventurer, extends from Character.
APIAdventureDAO
This class provides methods for retrieving and persisting adventure data from and to an API.
APICannotBeAccessedException
This exception is thrown when the API cannot be accessed.
APICharacterDAO
This class provides methods for retrieving and persisting character data from and to an API.
ApiHelper
Helper class with the responsibility of reading and posting Strings to an HTTPS API.
APIMonsterDAO
This class provides methods for retrieving monster data from an API.
Boss
Class that represents a Boss, extending from Monster.
BossAmountExceededException
This exception is thrown when the amount of bosses in an encounter exceeds the maximum allowed.
BossesToAddExceededException
This exception is thrown when the number of bosses to add to an encounter exceeds the maximum allowed.
BusinessException
This is a general exception class for business logic errors.
Champion
Class that represents a Champion, extends from Warrior.
Character
Abstract class that represents a Character.
CharacterAlreadyInThePartyException
This exception is thrown when a character is already in the party.
CharacterDAO
Interface that provides methods for retrieving and persisting character data.
CharacterFacade
Interface that provides methods for managing characters.
CharacterManager
This class manages characters and provides methods for retrieving and persisting character data.
CharacterNameAlreadyExistsException
This exception is thrown when a character with the same name already exists in the system.
Cleric
Class that represents a Cleric, extends from Character.
Controller
Class that interactions with the user, controls his inputs and request to the respective manager to do a certain logic.
Dice
Class that represents a Dice.
EmptyEncounterException
This exception is thrown when an encounter is empty.
FileErrorException
This exception is thrown when an error occurs while accessing a file.
InsufficientCharactersAmountException
This exception is thrown when the number of characters is insufficient to start an adventure.
InvalidAdventureOptionException
This exception is thrown when an invalid option is selected for an adventure.
InvalidCharacterClassException
This exception is thrown when an invalid character class is selected.
InvalidCharacterLevelException
This exception is thrown when an invalid character level is selected.
InvalidCharacterNameException
This exception is thrown when an invalid character name is selected.
InvalidCharactersAmountForAdventureException
This exception is thrown when an invalid number of characters is selected for an adventure.
InvalidCharacterToAddOptionException
This exception is thrown when an invalid option is selected for adding a character.
JSONAdventureDAO
This class provides methods for retrieving adventure data from and to a JSON file.
JSONCharacterDAO
This class provides methods for retrieving character data from and to a JSON file.
JSONMonsterDAO
This class provides methods for retrieving monster data from a JSON file.
Mage
Class that represents a Mage, extends from Character.
Main
 
Menu
Class that contains the needed methods to show to the user.
Menu.mainMenuOptions
 
Monster
Abstract class that represents a Monster.
MonsterDAO
Interface that provides methods for retrieving and persisting adventure data.
MonsterFacade
Interface that provides methods for managing monsters.
MonsterManager
This class manages monsters and provides methods for retrieving monster data.
MonsterMapAdapter
This class is a TypeAdapter for a map of Monsters and their Integer values.
NoCharactersFoundException
This exception is thrown when no characters are found.
Paladin
Class that represents a Paladin, extends from Cleric.
PersistenceException
This exception is thrown when an error occurs during persistence operations.
StandardMonster
Class that represents a StandardMonster (Minion or Lieutenant), extending from Monster.
UnknownCharacterClassException
This exception is thrown when an unknown character class is found during persistence operations.
Warrior
Class that represents a Warrior, extends from Adventurer.
